product_name: Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis Crew Top - Toddlers'
long_description: The Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis crew top for toddlers provides a comfortable layer of clothing for cold days of playing in the snow or for everyday use. Soft and warm merino wool naturally resists odor. Raglan sleeves enhance fit, allowing freedom of movement. Flatlock seams help eliminate chafing. With a UPF 39 rating, the Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis crew top provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: The Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis crew top for toddlers provides a comfortable layer of clothing for cold days of playing in the snow or for everyday use.
